'''Mythcon 7''' was the seventh annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' Arthurian Elements in [[Charles Williams|Williams]], [[C.S. Lewis|Lewis]], and [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]
*'''Guest of Honor:''' Thomas Howard (Inklings scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Bruce McMenomy
*'''Coordinator:''' Mary Morman
